title: USB drivers for the playstation 3 Sixaxis controller
description:
Heres the instructions to make it work

1. Unpack Sixaxis_PS3_Win32_Driver_For_PC.rar
2. Install the filter driver (libusb-win32-filter-bin-0.1.10.1.exe).
3. Plug the SIXAXIS into your PC using a USB lead.
4. Run ps3sixaxis_en.exe (This will open a black window that will dissapear again.)
5. Push the PS button on the SIXAXIS

You have to run ps3sixaxis_en.exe and press the ps button everytime you plug in the controller.
